metadata.title: CVE-2024-35912 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:iwlwifi: mvm: rfi: fix potential response leaks If the rx payload lengthcheck fails, or if kmemdup() fails, we still need to free the commandresponse. Fix that.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-38.38').
